thread.title: GFA to hold Ordinary Congress on November 9-10
thread.title_full: GFA to hold Ordinary Congress on November 9-10

title: GFA to hold Ordinary Congress on November 9-10
text:
Sports News | 20 October 2015 10:42 CET GFA to hold Ordinary Congress on November 9-10 By Ghana FA 
The Ghana Football Association will hold its Ordinary Congress on 9-10 November at the Ghanaman Soccer Centre of Excellence in Prampram. 
123 delegates are to expected to convene at the venue to review the activity report for the just ended football season and usher in the new season. 
This is in accordance with Article 23.3.1 of the GFA Statutes which states that " The GFA Congress shall meet in ordinary session once every football season normally before the commencement of the season". 
Newly elected members of the GFA National Executive Committee are also expected to be sworn in at the upcoming Ordinary Congress.
